strings.Value: "Our kind knows how to hide. Longshanks don't. Why do you rest like this, then, without cover? Not afraid?"
"You longshanks and halfshanks build your cities, with walls around them... and here you sit without any protection in the clear sight. Strange."
"What can be worse than goblin's nagging? Only when he is right. Somebody should have cared about the camp's protection."
"I don't have to hide. Somebody trying to eat me will learn to regret it, I promise you that!"
"Honestly... Nok-Nok is right. But, considering him being around, even protected camp isn't safe enough."
"We count on our companions, Nok-Nok. Someone will raise an alert and warn the others if anything goes wrong."
"Even if you can't hide, you should at least get some rest, so you'll be ready to face any enemies who come by."
"Even if you can't hide, you should at least get some rest, so you'll be ready to face any enemies who come by."
